PolicyName: The top rate of income tax should be increased to over Â£150 000 per year
We should adopt a new global standard on automatic exchange of tax information in order to reduce tax avoidance
The clawback of bankers bonuses in cases of inappropriate behaviour should be extended
MPs should be band from holding paid directorships
Jobseeker's claimants should lose their benefits if they refuse a job offer

Child grooming suspects should be arrested for associating with children after an Abduction Warning
